Prepare Data for MDS Plot

Source: R/mds_helpers.R
prepare_mds_plot_df.Rd

Creates a data frame of MDS coordinates merged with optional subject information for plotting.

Usage

prepare_mds_plot_df(
  mds_fit,
  valid_subject_indices,
  valid_subjects_mask,
  n_total_subjects,
  subject_info = NULL,
  plot_labels = FALSE
)

Arguments

mds_fit

Result from `run_cmdscale_safe`.

valid_subject_indices

Indices of subjects included in the analysis.

valid_subjects_mask

Logical vector identifying valid subjects in the original distance matrix.

n_total_subjects

Total number of subjects in the projector object.

subject_info

Optional data frame with one row per subject.

plot_labels

Logical indicating if labels should be prepared.

Value

A data frame suitable for `ggplot2`.
